entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpLogging Middleware option to log all headers #40981
  • Why are only GET requests supported for a WebSocket request? #40977
  • Consider trimmer friendly alternatives in Http.Routing that do not initialize a RouteValueDictionary #40975
  • `_framework/blazor-hotreload` 404 when running under subdirectory #40971
    6.0.x
  • --Framework is not consistent with --framework other templates use #40970
    7.0-preview6
  • Disable Minimal API #40968

Closed

  • Exception thrown in RequestDelegateFactory.Create when handling null as a default value for nullable struct type #40774
    7.0-preview5
  • Support accessing `RouteHandlerContext` in `IRouteHandlerFilter` #40724
    7.0-preview4
  • InstallVisualStudio.ps1: aka.ms link doesn't retrieve json? #40976
  • FromBody wouldnt honor System.Text.Json.JsonPropertyName for deserializing #40766
  • Session values not maintained between HttpClient call and normal XHR requests #40089
    Discussions
  • Blazor WebAssemblyPrerendered load images twice #40978
  • The type or namespace name 'class' could not be found in visual studio 17.1.2 #40949
  • dotnet watch run crashes when files get modified #40946
  • Blazor: Auto (implicitly) declare component @ref property #40972
  • Authorize Attribute Error #40797
  • Server shutdown prevents large response from being sent to client during draining #40932
    7.0-preview4
  • Consider trimmer friendly overloads for HttpRequestJsonExtensions / HttpResponseJsonExtensions #40566
    7.0-preview4
  • Filtering SignalR ping messages #40750
  • Undocumented breaking change in default static asset handling .NET 6: Files in wwwroot/ no longer included as content, in publishable zip file #40803

PullRequests

Created

  • Consolidate Blazor Server Template Directives #40984
    area-mvc
  • Support default value for nullable struct parameter #40774 #40983
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Annotate additional assemblies for trimming #40974
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Trim Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting #40969
    area-runtime
  • Fix DelegationRule to work after receiver restarts #40967
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Adding support for custom JsonConverter(s) when deserializing JSON patches to generic object types #40966
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add RouteHandlerContext as parameter to IRouteHandlerFilter.InvokeAsync #40919
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3
  • Typo: Update WebApplicationFactoryClientOptions.cs comments #40963
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Don't execute test if restore failed #40979
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • updating showprofile to use correct icon #40980
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Fix Kestrel conn close on shutdown while response is writing #40933
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Remove some unused code from installers #40956
    area-infrastructure
  • Add trimming guidance for developers #40902
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching common HttpResults types #40965
    area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
